articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: 'Captain America: Brave New World' Draws Mixed First Reactions - Variety
articles.description: 'Captain America: Brave New World' has been unveiled for the press, and the first reactions toward the comic book tentpole are coming in lukewarm.
articles.content:
Marvel’s “Captain America: Brave New World” has been unveiled for members of the press, and the first reactions toward the comic book tentpole are coming in lukewarm.
